title: Ticket #4746: JOB_DEFAULT_REQUEST_MEMORY has incorrect documentation
description:
In http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/manual/v8.2/3_5Policy_Configuration.html#33607, it states the default value for JOB_DEFAULT_REQUESTMEMORY is: 

   ifThenElse(MemoryUsage =!= UNDEFINED, MemoryUsage, 1)

but experimentally (unless I'm setting it myself somewhere I can't find), I think it might be: 

   ifthenelse(MemoryUsage =!= undefined,MemoryUsage,( ImageSize + 1023 ) / 1024)
